title: 76/961/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 December 1976 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Directive 72/160/EEC (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 7 December 1976  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Directive 72/160/EEC  (Only the Dutch text is authentic)  (76/961/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Having regard to the amendments contained in decision No 161 of the Board of the Foundation administering the Agricultural Development and Reorganization Fund, the provisions implementing Directive 72/160/EEC in the Netherlands continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures within the meaning of Article 6 of Directive 72/160/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 December 1976.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 9. (2)OJ No L 141, 24.5.1974, p. 4. (3)OJ No L 2, 4.1.1975, p. 32. (4)OJ No L 286, 5.11.1975, p. 19. (5)OJ No L 138, 26.5.1976, p. 21.
